entries.name: break_points()
entries.desc: Returns the list of break points where execution will be stopped.

entries.name: stdout()
entries.desc: Returns the IO used as stdout. Defaults to STDOUT

entries.name: stdout=(s)
entries.desc: Sets the IO used as stdout. Defaults to STDOUT

entries.name: thread_list_all()
entries.desc: Prints all threads in @thread_list to @stdout. Returns a sorted array of values from the @thread_list hash.

entries.name: waiting()
entries.desc: Returns the list of waiting threads.
